product_name: SmartWool Heathered Rib Socks - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The casual SmartWool Heathered Rib Socks are no-nonsense ribbed socks with built-in, cushioned comfort. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The casual SmartWool Heathered Rib Socks are no-nonsense ribbed socks with built-in, cushioned comfort.
